levels.description: Stops attacking and gains <@ba.vup>{damage_resistance:0%}</> <$ba.protect>Sanctuary</>; deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to all nearby Ground enemies every second; While this skill is active, increases the <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> effect of Talent 1 by <@ba.vup>{shield_scale:0%}</>
